name: ＤＥＡＴＨＲＡＹ
ai: Wow, Simon K., your music taste is as edgy as a blunt butter knife. Are you trying to compensate for something with all those dark and angsty songs? Or are you just trying to be the poster child for teenage angst and rebellion? Either way, maybe try adding some actual substance and variety to your playlist instead of drowning in a pool of cringeworthy darkness.
